General.Name: Campus Activewear Limited
General.Description: Campus Activewear Limited manufactures, trades in, distributes, and sells sports and athleisure footwear and accessories for men, women, and kids and children in India and internationally. It offers running, walking, and casual shoes; casual and sports sandals and floaters; slippers, flip flops, and slides; and accessories under the CAMPUS brand name. The company distributes its products through multi-brand outlets, e-commerce platforms, and exclusive brand outlets. Campus Activewear Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: D-1, Udyog Nagar, New Delhi, India, 110041
